"Menu Reorganization":
"When a window from the Main Menu is open,
you can rearrange its location in the Menu.

Related windows: Equipment, Personal, System,
Task/Quest, Communication, Chat, Shop"

"While a window is open, press <%MultiSelect>
to freely rearrange its location in the Main Menu.

To reset the menu to its original state,
press <%ChangeCtrlWindowForward>."
